com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility.Accrual

  • Packages that use Accrual 
    Package Description
    com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility
    Global (non-prorated) representations of loan facility types.

      com.opengamma.strata.collect.tuple.Pair<Accrual,Accrual> Accrual.split()
      Split cash and PIK since ultimate sub-accruals may have different periods since PIK capitalizations always occur on a full-period basis "travel for free".
      com.opengamma.strata.collect.tuple.Pair<Accrual,Accrual> Accrual.split()
      Split cash and PIK since ultimate sub-accruals may have different periods since PIK capitalizations always occur on a full-period basis "travel for free".
